nodes.bodyText: Where did you get this magical version of autorest?
Shouldn't there be a change to azure-core version in this file, too?
azure core version was automatically updated when it was released.
Question - (I know that I am late on these changes) what changed in the swagger file to enable AutoRest to define JsonPatchDocument as an acceptable input type?
It should just be due to using a newer version of autorest, right?

that is an excellent question. code was generated using the latest branch of autorest since these changes were not published to npm yet. There will be a release on autorest and we will bump the autorest version when it is available.

I imagine autorest looks for the consumes field instead:
        "consumes": [
          "application/json-patch+json"
        ],
